mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaolian_id as jiaolianId ,a.jianshenfang_id as jianshenfangId ,a.kecheng_name as kechengName ,a.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,a.kecheng_kaike as kechengKaike ,a.kecheng_content as kechengContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jianshenfang.jianshenfang_name as jianshenfangName ,jianshenfang.jianshenfang_photo as jianshenfangPhoto ,jianshenfang.jianshenfang_address as jianshenfangAddress ,jianshenfang.jianshenfang_content as jianshenfangContent ,jiaolian.jiaolian_name as jiaolianName ,jiaolian.jiaolian_phone as jiaolianPhone ,jiaolian.jiaolian_photo as jiaolianPhoto ,jiaolian.sex_types as sexTypes ,jiaolian.rongyu_content as rongyuContent ,jiaolian.jiaolian_content as jiaolianContent
FROM kecheng a left JOIN jianshenfang jianshenfang ON a.jianshenfang_id = jianshenfang.id left JOIN jiaolian jiaolian ON a.jiaolian_id = jiaolian.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaolian_id = #{params.jiaolianId} )
and ( a.jianshenfang_id = #{params.jianshenfangId} )
and a.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and a.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and a.kecheng_kaike like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengKaike},'%')
and a.kecheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jianshenfang_id IS NOT NULL
and jianshenfang.jianshenfang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianshenfangName},'%')
and jianshenfang.jianshenfang_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianshenfangAddress},'%')
and jianshenfang.jianshenfang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianshenfangContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jianshenfang.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(jianshenfang.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiaolian_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaolian.jiaolian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianName},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianPhone},'%')
and jiaolian.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and jiaolian.rongyu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.rongyuContent},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
